objects.name: Rootkit Behavior
objects.description: Behaviors of a rootkit: "A rootkit is a collection of computer software, typically malicious, designed to enable access to a computer or areas of its software that is not otherwise allowed and often masks its existence or the existence of other software.

x_mitre_methods.definition: Hides the usage of any kernel modules by the malware instance.
x_mitre_methods.name: Hide Kernel Modules

x_mitre_methods.definition: Hides any system services that the malware instance creates or injects itself into.
x_mitre_methods.name: Hide Services

x_mitre_methods.definition: Hides one or more threads that belong to the malware instance.
x_mitre_methods.name: Hide Threads

x_mitre_methods.definition: Hides the usage of userspace libraries by the malware instance.
x_mitre_methods.name: Hide Userspace Libraries

x_mitre_methods.definition: Prevents the API hooks installed by the malware instance from being removed.
x_mitre_methods.name: Prevent API Unhooking

x_mitre_methods.definition: Prevents access to the Windows registry, including to the entire registry and/or to particular registry keys/values.
x_mitre_methods.name: Prevent Registry Access

x_mitre_methods.definition: Prevent Windows registry keys and/or values associated with the malware instance from being deleted from a system.
x_mitre_methods.name: Prevent Registry Deletion

x_mitre_methods.definition: Prevents access to the file system, including to specific files and/or directories associated with the malware instance.
x_mitre_methods.name: Prevent File Access

x_mitre_methods.definition: Prevents files and/or directories associated with the malware instance from being deleted from a system.
x_mitre_methods.name: Prevent File Deletion

x_mitre_methods.definition: Prevents access to system memory where the malware instance may be storing code or data.
x_mitre_methods.name: Prevent Memory Access

x_mitre_methods.definition: Prevents other software from hooking native system APIs.
x_mitre_methods.name: Prevent Native API Hooking
